original_text: And I will draw out Sisera, the general of Jabin's army, to meet you by the river Kishon with his chariots and his troops, and I will give him into your hand’?”
korean_text: 내가 야빈의 군대 장관 시스라와 그의 병거들과 그의 무리를 기손 강으로 이끌어 네게 이르게 하고 그를 네 손에 넘겨 주리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: And I will draw out Sisera
to meet you by the river Kishon
with his chariots and his troops
and I will give him into your hand
